evidence.claim: Seven Bridges uses AWS and GCP for cloud infrastructure.
Their platform adheres to HIPAA compliance for handling health-related data.
They support FHIR and HL7 standards in their health-tech solutions.
Seven Bridges implements Apache Kafka for data streaming services.
The company mentions X12 transactions for healthcare interoperability.

icp.icp_reason: No specific evidence of X12 transaction capabilities or use cases for clearinghouse services.
